Text: @sCOrp: Your rips are usually good, and this may seem a bit picky, but if you're going to shoot for the 700mb filesize, you might as well make it *less than* 700mb so it can actually be burned to CD. 703mb might as well be 725, or 800, or 1GB..... Thanx. (695 is ideal as then you can burn a couple of covers with it)
